body.name: Lightning GPS GL300 GPS Tracker for Vehicles with Magnetic Case - Subscription Required Car Tracker Device for Vehicles - Fleet GPS Tracker Automotive Tracking Device - Cars Hidden GPS Tracking Device
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 18 hrs 59 mins
features: ADDITIONAL SUBSCRIPTION REQUIRED - Your GPS car tracker has 3 afforable plans to choose from for your vehicle tracking device. Our car tracking device to use with smartphones, tablets & desktops has an annual plan at $17.99 per month, quarterly plan at $22.99 per month, or $29.99 month to month

REAL TIME PERSONALIZED UPDATES - With up to 5 second interval location updates your car GPS tracker makes the perfect kids tracking device as a GPS tracker for kids to always know they are safe throughout the day. Our real time gps tracker gives you real-time reporting with speed alerts & geofence notifications

PORTABLE & POWERFUL MAGNETIC CASE - Our magnetic GPS tracker for vehicles combines a mini GPS tracking device & weatherproof case with powerful magnets to be discreetly hidden to track location & movements of your people, vehicles, & assets. Use as a motorcycle GPS tracker, GPS bike tracker, trucks GPS tracker, trailer GPS tracker & more

EASY TO USE ACCURATE TRACKING - Our vehicle tracker has consisitent coverage throughout the United States, Canada, & Mexico ensuring your personal GPS tracker has continuous accurate location reporting throughout all of North America. Our user friendly software interface can be easily accessed by logging in from your desktop browser, phone, or tablet

NO CONTRACTS & EASY CANCELLATION - At Lightning GPS we stand by our products & applications offering a full refund warranty if you experience any issues with your Lightning GPS product. With no contracts to sign & hassle-free cancellation Lightning GPS strives for 100% customer satisfaction

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ultimate watchdog protection device for tangible assets
reviews.reviewText: I decided to buy the Lightning GPS device with the magnetic case after loosing not one but TWO of my most sea worthy and expensive boat skiffs in less than a year to either unsuspecting thieves, or by the occurrence of mother nature's wrath being on the open ocean. Less than a month ago I just put my second dingy in the water after recently having it fiberglassed, painted and gel coated to have it dissappear right off the map a week later. With only one skiff left to my name, I was sick to my stomach over the thought of putting it in the water until I learned about this fantastic GPS gadget. I purchased it while it was discounted during Amazon Prime Day. It arrived three days later which was really awesome because ever since the onset of COVID I honestly can't remember the last time I received anything from Amazon in less than a week or usually more. I opened it up as soon as my package arrived and charged it up. This requires a teeny amount of patience on the end users behalf, ( standard battery charging time for the unit requires 4-5 hours). In the meantime, you may want to consider reading a book, watching the Titanic for the 1000th time cooking up a pot roast, or even going out for a hike. It's worth the wait, I promise! Besides, the battery is designed to last approximately two weeks. So, on day one...I decided to test it on my canoe, and I must say ... right out the gate I was beyond super impressed within less than the first hour it was in operation! This product delivers with 100% tack sharp precision!I left the canoe tied up to my anchor line and drove an hour away home. I opened up the corresponding app that tracks and accurately pinpoints all the activities of any given asset the GPS device is attached to. It shows all the history since its inception, of everywhere it goes, date/ time how many miles traveled, speed etc. THIS BABY IS AWESOME! There are too many features to list, which involves time to make configurations and possessing a fair amount of technical knowledge to establish geo fences and such, but it's not required for just basic purposes. Yes, you do need a subscription which the website is provided in the box along with instructions on charging the unit and downloading the app. The website is pretty straightforward, offering multiple tiers sign-up levels and pricing options to choose from (depending on ones own individual or business needs). In addition, they give you the choice to add-on device insurance for right around $4 +/- which is a minimal investment in comparison to paying full price. The benefit of purchasing the add-on insurance allows you the peace of mind for free replacement should your device ever become lost, stolen, or damaged. They also provide free customer support for anyone who may need or requires personal assistance. I'm so glad I chose Lightening GPS services to be my eyes on my personal property when I'm not available. All in all- 5 Stars! Excellent product! I will definitely purchase again in the future for use on my bigger boats.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tracking made easy
reviews.reviewText: The device is amazing and easy to set up. It tells the speed and when the car is on. The best feature is the responsiveness of the custom service agents; quick, reliable and happy to helping! Trish is amazing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid GPS Tracker
reviews.reviewText: This is my first time buying a GPS tracker. Got it for tracking our cars in case of any theft. So far after a month of use it’s running solid. Last up to 1-2 weeks depends on how much driving you’re doing before needing to charge it. The app will let you know how much battery is left. Depending on your need, you can determine what type of tier you want for the subscription tracking service but for 3 months only $100 for tracking every 30 sec not bad. Really accurate, the case as shown in the picture is very sturdy & the magnet is STRONG. It’s not small to be discrete enough but if you hide it in a good place I don’t think someone will notice it’s even there with how the case is. Would definitely Recommend this to someone, will update in about 3 months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small and reliable
reviews.reviewText: Recently just bought this to track my motorcycle just incase something happened. It works great. Does a pretty good job at being accurate. Usually within a 100 ft or less on the GPS app for it. Pretty straight forward and easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Reliable and worth it.
reviews.reviewText: It works as should, with ease and its easy to tack through the app and to set up as well. I put it on my car while I let a my younger sibling use it and they respected my vehicle. Wasn’t speeding or driving crazy. As the gps would tell me if they did.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very important to know the battery lasts very long (5 days) and the charge is quick.
reviews.reviewText: I really loved the way the gps attaches to the car with a strong well built magnet protection cover, the way the battery lasts (15 days) and the precision of the tracking. They also offer a variety of plans to chose what fits in your pocket. Recently I chatted with Gen that precisely answered me on a Saturday evening about all the details and options of my plan. He was very clear , direct and concise. So I would say the quality and service is overall is fantastic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good tracker with good app support
reviews.reviewText: After doing some research I decided to get the Lightning GPS GL300 GPS Tracker mainly due to the low(er) monthly fee as well as the basic functionality I wanted. There have been a lot of stolen cars these days and I wanted to get a tracker with the hopes that if my car is stolen (knock on wood) I would be able to get it back. I was on a trip for 21 days and fully charged it and left it in my car. I got the magnetic box to hold it and I have it in my trunk. The reception is fine, no issues. This was a good test for battery life. The battery died around day 19. I think the extended battery might be good if you are thinking of going to be away longer or don't want to charge it as much. The charge takes about 4 hours IIRC. The instructions are not totally clear, but their Cust Support responded pretty quickly. I only wanted to set up a geofence and have alerts to my phone and email. You can only do this from a computer and not from the app. Anyway, so far so good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does What it Says!!
reviews.reviewText: It is a great product, strong and holds, tracks pretty accurately ( it’s like a nine minute delay until it puts it in parking mode though… Wish it was more like four minutes) … It’s a good product and I do recommend!Battery life is pretty darn long as well! I guess it depends on traveling time, but I have been getting a good nine days for a charge!

reviews.reviewTitle: Amazing gps! Works so well, accurate, easy to use!!
reviews.reviewText: So small easy to hide and works so well!!!
Works great! The location is always fairly accurate.
